content.detailedDescription: I was always skeptical of  other life beyond our planet but my father once told me he served 14 years on the royal navy as an morse code operator seeing many sights around the globe but was stunned for him to tell me that one night out on the deck he was abducted by aliens and that when he returned he lost time by an  approx 1 hour i was not skeptical at all my father is a man of his words and was trained very hard by the navy but ever since i was 15 16 years  old it had been watching me for a while until i was around 25 years old i've seen so many  ufo sightings  but 1 was a as daunting i was in my bedroom watching jaws the movie with my interior bedroom light on with the interior door shut my room lit up a complete bright yellow red it completely out shun my interior light i then walked down stairs 10 minutes later outside to have a cigarette  it was to my amazement that i was witnessing a large bright yellow red light roughly 500 feet in the air it was motionless just hovering no noise no nothing it was very weird  to be seeing this as i'm used to seeing military jets etc as i'm not to far from raf fairford as i was observing this object for around 30 seconds whilst hovering it did a 3 path zig zag in  what i believe a speed not of this earth  the very next day i yet again was outside near the garage with a cigarette i looked up to the  clear night sky and again it was there hovering but a little closer in altitude the same yellow red like fire then zig zag again and i'm starting to get scared by  this point as i went upstairs in amazement i went to the bathroom mirror and   i was what i can describe as a sun burn only to one side of my face  i'm starting to believe if i've been abducted by aliens
content.summary: Room lit up complete bright yellow red out shining my interior light it then hovered for 30 seconds then flew off in a weird zig zag path with what i believe a speed not of this earth

content.detailedDescription:
In the year 1973 i was traveling in my vehicle from levittown to san juan, puerto rico. i saw a bunch of vehicles stopped on the side of the road. so i also stopped to see what was happening. there was a small flying saucer hovering above a cement pipe factory. it was metallic in color , had a dome,
i counted five portholes. as it was hovering there were different colored lights coming out of the portholes as there was something spinning in the center of the craft. after a few minutes whatever was spinning in the center of the craft sped up and the lights turned to a golden bright color and the
craft shot into the sky and disappeared.
content.summary: Small saucer  hovrring above building for 5 minutes then took off

content.detailedDescription: The same as above will upload photos
content.summary: Nearly every nite there's strange star like lights moving around with the brightest one hovering over big teacos

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription:
This ufo was visibly for a period of 2 nights up above the mountain range in my area, an airplane flew behind it and there were also power polls nearby. on the second night i decided to try and get a better look by using my phone to zoom in upon doing something my phone went haywire it turned off and when i looked up it was gone. immediately i had a sense to look to my right and there was an intense bright light quite close and i immediately ran inside scared out of my skull. my toddler also had a wierd sense and looked at the wall and made a strange movement. i looked outside the orb was there.

after about 20 minutes i decided to look outside again and the light was no longer there which was crazy as the light was too large to just dissappear.  my partner also saw the original ufo over the mountain top too.
content.summary: 2 day observation

content.detailedDescription: I  was  rideing  on  a  metro  buss  on  my  way  to  play  poker  i  always  take  a  window   seat  i'm  alway's  looking  up..  this  time  when  i  was  looking  up    from  the  buss  window.. i saw  a  black  in  color  round circular  disk  object  just  sitting  up  there  not  moveing..  i  have  seen  eagles  fling  highas  the  clouds   high  but  i  no  this  was  no  bird i gazed   upon  it  for  as  long  as  i  couldwondering  hmmmmm  what  was  that..  a  planet  the  size  of  pluto  hmmm    i  think  notso  as  the  buss  turns     down  different   streets   i  lose  sight  of the  object  this  isnt  my  1st  sighting  this  is  my  3rd  and  i  have  been  abducted  missing  time  unexplaind  and  i  have  seen  1st  hand   the  shape  shifting  reptilians with  cat  like  eyes  being frozen  with  fear and  not  bein  able  to  move  the  goverment  is  hideing  the  truth  i  am  here  to  tell  all.. they  are  here   and  have  been  longer  then  we  have  been  and  they  are  working  along  side  are  goverment.   and  if  you   dont   belive  me   ur  a  bigger  foolthen  u  realize
content.summary: High  abouve  the  cloud  level  i  saw  a  round  circlular  object

content.detailedDescription: Sometime around the 15 th of nov 1967 me and my coworkers were going home after our shift it was about 5:30 am when suddenly there were 3 dark colored triangle shaped objects appear just above the power poles the moon was full so it was not hard to make out that this was not something you see every day.  and they were about  3 to 4 feet in size and they came down to check us out they made a circle around our car and they hovered for a few minutes and they were gone in just a couple of seconds.
content.summary: Leaving work at 5am spotted 3 triangle shaped objects in the sky just above the power poles near my home at the time.

content.detailedDescription:
I was at an outdoor birthday celebration at 1553 albany highway beckenham.
the children were looking at the stars and picking out the bright ones.
when lights were first noticed i thought it was a domestic airplane flying at a very high altitude,such as intercontinental flights.
there were three lights grouped  something like navigation lights on a commercial airplane but much larger and brighter than normal aircraft navigation lights.The lights were flashing at roughly the same rate as normal aircraft.
lights were moving from south to north at about the same speed as an airplane at high altitude.When about directly above lights made sharp turn to head in a westerly direction.
after traveling west for about 30 seconds they disappeared.
a commercial airplane landed at perth airport at the same time so i could see both at the same time.
i feel it classifies as a ufo because its altitude,right angle change of direction and sudden disappearance.
it has aroused my curiosity and would really like to know what it was or could have been.
content.summary: Three flashing lights traveled from south to north before changing direction to west then vanished.T
content.locationName: Beckenham Perth Western A, Western Australia

content.detailedDescription: Purple fling squid that followed me frome fruitland to midvale where i worked at the time then just before daybreak they huddled togeather the split out in different directions
content.summary: Purple fling squid that followed me frome fruitland to midvale where i worked at the time then just before daybreak they huddled togeather the split out in diffrent directions

content.detailedDescription: Noticed on intersection at hannafords grocery store, a small pulsing globe with three distinct lights. red, green and blue. two mainly sittuated at the rear of globe. moving around towards a general direction of north to south. it moved up and down, left to right. then following shortly afterward was a giant triangle with two massive headlights at the front illuminating a vast area of the sky. as it gets closer i see there are lights flashing around the sides. all colors of lights on the diamond are white only. slowly moves over keene from north to south. i lose track of the small globe near the powerlines near the wkbk tower. so i chase down the diamond to head it off at the pass. i go to knapp and koster parking lot where another bystander wittnesses it with me as it slowly flies directly overhead until out of view. i recorded video with my cell phone as it was overhead but cellphones dont do justice. i know i called the local police and reported a ufo and asked if anyone else had. dispatch said no. they thought it was an april fools joke. it definately was not.
content.summary: Very large diamond shape with apparent seperate pulsing drone traveling ahead

content.detailedDescription: I was on my south facing porch obout 3 am we i seen a lite about the size of a plane that moved west to east at a very rapid pace faster than all any aircraft that i know of so to me it was very very fast went out of my site but i never told anyone so i am no sure on the exact date please forgive me for not document it earlier
content.summary: Fast moving just over tree line to my south west to east

content.detailedDescription:
I was walking my dog and was walking easy. she started acting very scared and tried to run for home. i looked around to see if something spooked her. i looked up and saw this object drop out of the sky and stopped dead, it didn't slow down. it just stopped and hovered about 500 feet away from me, and about 700 feet from me, and hovering about 3 buildings from my home. i didn't hear anything, smell anything, i did however feel a buzz like sensation. i honestly thought something was going to happen to me, my adrenaline was pumping hard and it took everything in me not to run and stand as still as possible. which is not me, i am a very curious person and want to figure out any mystery that i come across. it has served me well mny of times, but has also been a disservice at times. i thought i was going to get abducted, hurt or god forbid killed. after a few (seemingly) seconds i remembered i had my phone on me and went to grab it. however, i noticed the phone (moto g) was very, very slow (also not typical, i pride myself on keeping my computers and such in optimal running condition), after a few seconds i got the camera app running and snapped a few pictures after the he 4th or 5th the phone shut off and over heated. the vessle then out of no where shot west towards the gulf of mexico. i didn't see it after then. the dog calms down and looks at me like if she was saying (can we go the hell home now), and we run home. i get home and my wife asks me where have i been. she says i was gone for almost a half an hour. i don't think i was abducted, i think i got so lost in the moment that i lost track of time. i tried to get my phone back on, but she wouldn't boot. i opened the back up and the battery was hot as hell. the battery shorted out. (no i dont have it, lithium ion batteries can burn skin if thry rupture) i got a new battery and it booted up and saw the pictures.

i showed my wife and son and they both believe it was a unmanned drone. i don't believe it is a drone. i am a huge fan of aircraft and know every make, model, shape and size of all human made craft. this was not in any category if craft that i know of. and on top of it. all human craft make noise because of the motors.
content.summary: Was walking dog and she freaked out. i looked around and saw this drop out of the sky and stopped then shot west

content.detailedDescription: I was driving from auburn to huntsville, alabama, i saw bright lights in the sky, assumed it was a far away advertisement sign, the closer i got, i saw the dark metal floating. i was very scared and thought it would attack me. then i saw 3 cars pulled over looking up at it so i hit the gas out of fear. i rolled down window to see and it was completely silent. as i passed under it, i watched it go straight up and disappear into the sky. i was scared and looking backwards and upwards the entire drive home.
content.summary: I was driving from auburn to huntsville, saw hovering lights ahead, closer saw dark, silent, floating metal. people were out of their cars looking up, i kept driving, looked out window, it went straight up and disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Me and my friend saw a ufo fly over our cow field. we saw it when a flash went into the ski. when we first saw it we thought it was a another airplane but then it didn't make a noise. so then we got scared and hid behind a trailer. about 5 seconds after we saw about 3 to 5 airplanes zooming towards the craft. shortly after we lost site of the craft and planes. then we took off running to the house and told our parents. then we looked out the window and saw more planes flying across the sky in the direction of the ufo.
content.summary: Me and my friend saw a ufo fly above our field.

content.detailedDescription:
I'm so tired of contacting people about this and getting no response. 

i had a ufo and alien encounter in 2005 while i had a digital recorder on and recording. 

i posted it on youtube. 

just go to google and type in "[title moved ti fi section/cms/tg]" and listen to it.

actually, here is the link;  [link moved ti fi section/cms/tg]

but you have to have really loud speakers and you have to turn the volume up as high as you can stand it. you won't regret it, i promise you.

you can hear the aliens speaking one word that activated a transport system. which you can also hear. 

the aliens were not visible to me, but one of them did speak to me in english. when it spoke the inside of my head vibrated very strong. so the conversation was not recorded. (was not picked up by the recorder).

the only thing i recollect it saying was, "you have an intelligent mind for a teenager (i was 35 at the time and must have told them i was a teenager for some reason. i was in a trance). do you want to come with us?"

i wonder if anybody will ever get the fact that i might be the only person alive that has a bonified actual recording of a ufo, hi tech trasport device, alien contact with aliens speaking.

please somebody take this seriously. it really did happen and it's a very real recording. but again... you have to have loud speakers and turn the volume up as loud as you can stand it. 

and if you notice the other recordings i posted, just please don't worry about them for now. they are real too by the way.
content.summary: Event audio recorded... please speak to me... i'll call you tomorrow

content.detailedDescription:
About 2am, myself and 2 of my close friends decided to go to their 3rd floor balcony outside to get some air. we were out there about 3 minutes when i seen something very strange above and out from us as we stood on the balcony. it was a clear night and some stars were visible and airplanes were in the area like a typical night. the apartments we were in have outside lighting and there are businesses around that have bright lights as well. no one was drinking alcohol or on any medications. the 3 of us all seen the flying craft at the same time and seen it pretty clear. 

the craft was a gray black or dark color. it was sort of triangular in shape. it had tube-like structures around it, which made it hard to make out more clearly, its shape. it also had large bubbles or lights? or globe shaped objects all around it. there were no lights on it or they were off. absolutely no lights and no sound coming from it. it was maybe very large truck sized or larger. it was not that far from us, perhaps 20 feet above and 8 feet out from us. we watched it move in the sky at i guess a medium speed. very smooth flying and moved in a straight line. we tried searching online for photos, videos and drawings of this object. we found nothing at all that even comes close to how this looked. it was the strangest thing i have ever seen. it was not a drone. nothing to compare it to. our speculation is that it could be: alien craft, new technology drone, military craft, spy craft, or a craft made by some company to fly undetected at night for wealthy and powerful people to survey areas and land for purchasing. we made this report in hopes to find out what it is or if others have seen this craft. no way really to photograph or video graph it, it was dark outside and the craft was very dark. there were also other bright lights high in the sky above us, flashing and moving and disappearing and reappearing. i have seen lights like this many times before, but they do not seem like public known technology, and seem to be unknown objects as well.
content.summary: Odd looking triangular shaped object with no lights spotted in coon rapids, mn

content.detailedDescription: The light followed the light from our flashlight(4)battery,up then down then from side to side,this lasted for about 10 minutes,we tried this the next night,but nothing happened,we were on vacation at the beach near san diego,california,i was around 9years old at the time.
content.summary: We had a flashlight,shined it at the sky,a light followed the light up then down,from side to side,then from side up ,then down,my brother had the light battery light,i was 9 or so then we were at the beach on vacation .

content.detailedDescription: I was out on my deck smoking a cigarette. i love to look at the sky and imagine astral projection. i was looking pretty much directly westward and i noticed two huge spheres clear in color or like a chameleon was able to match the color of the sky. approximately 2 minutes later i seen 4 f-15s (i think they were f-15s.)i dont know of any air force bases around here, so i suspect they were trailing the objects for awhile. i was not startled at all. purely curious. i watched the objects fly northwest and disappeared behind trees that totally block out the horizon. this is not my first sighting, but this was without doubt extraterrestrial. respectively, stephen hawking said e.Ts would be malevolent, but my theory is that if they have this super technology, they obviously have been around for millions or billions of years. for thier race to make it to the point where their technology is far beyond ours means they probably were peaceful unlike us. i subscribe to the ancient astronaut theory and believe humans have been "helped" genetically as well as in other ways. i also think that before the flood there were civilizations superior to our own. if humans were from earth, we would be able to live on earth harmoniously with nature.
content.summary: 2 clear circular crafts siluette with sky camo or cloaked

content.detailedDescription:
We were up at estes park for the day to take photos of landscapes and elk. everything seemed normal, clear sky and lot's of sun. we didn't notice anything while we were out taking photos.
the next day when we were looking at our photos we notice on a couple of them there was 3 white spots..Doesn't look like dust or bugs on the lens.. when we came to this one photo we notice this long silver looking object. it doesn't look like any plane we have ever photographed before..Most planes you can still make out the tail even if it's very small and far away.

not sure what this is but found it interesting. it's above the tree-line on the left side of the first photo (ufo 1)time stamped at june 9, 2015 at 10:56 am.

as you can see in the next photo (ufo 2) the 3 lights seem to have moved closer and you don't see the silver looking object time stamped at june 9, 2015 10:57am.

in the third photo (ufo 3) you will see the three lights have moved again and if you look on the inside of the right group of trees you can see the silver object again time stamped at june 9, 2015 10:57 am..

you will need to zoom in/in large the photos to see this better...Taken with a nikon d7000 with a 55-300mm nikkor lens with vr

we have just never seen this kind of thing in any of our photographs..
content.summary: We did not see the objects until we saw our photos, this is all from our photo, from what we can remember at the time.

content.detailedDescription: The even took place over a 2 month period during february and march of 2015. it appeared over many nights in a row.  so many i did not even bother to photograph it every time. the object was in the southwest sky every time it appeared.  it was a orb like object that changed colors from blue to green to yellow to orange.  when we photographed the orb it appeared to have tracers especially when you zoom in on the picture.  it made no sound and moved in all directions.  i know for a fact that the object was moving because there are power lines in front of the apartment and the object would move above and below the power lines.  there was no wind that was blowing that would have moved the power lines.  the orb would just vanish out of thin air.  the orb was witnessed by my fiancé'.  we also witnessed the same orb like object in a town 60 miles south of lubbock.  it was also in the southwestern skies.
content.summary: Object changed colors and and left tracers when photographed. movement was all over the place.

content.detailedDescription:
I lived in a tiny boom town near a dam in se colorado during the summer of 1970.  my good friend was spending the night at my house.  our town was so small that there were only a few kids that lived there and everyone was in their houses after dark, watching tv, or in bed.  for entertainment that night, we walked 1.5 city blocks from my house, crossed the empty highway to go to the only place still open,maybe between 9-11pm.  after playing pin ball, and buying sodapops, we crossed the highway again; no traffic anywhere, no streetlights; god as my wittness;  this thing came over us from behind, all at once.  dark in the center, red, blue, green round lights oscillating around the perimiter of the round shape. it was over us, like as high as the old phone and power lines were back then-15-20 ft.  we were surprised but not terrified and my 1st thought was some weird helicopter, then knew it couldn't be because there was no noise or wind from it.  total silence and it hovered right over us as we cantered the 1.5 city block,back home.  we ran into the front door of the house, telling my mom about it as we ran to the back screen door to watch as it had passed over my house, quietly gliding across the empty fields, s.E. towards, and over our old church and various houses.  it didn't harm us.  my mom and older sister probably didn't believe us, but do now.   i wasn't negatively affected by this and thought it was interesting and exciting but;  later when we went to bed, we weren't even talking about it when i turned off the light to go to sleep, my friend freaked out-panicked and said she saw huge black eyes all around.  she called her mom to come get her(my friend lived a couple of miles up the hill towards the dam).  i experienced none of the frightening visions that she did.  i just thought she was over sensitive and imagined that part.  strangely, it was not spoken of by any of us again, yet we remained good friends. i later moved out of state.  would love to know what she remembers about that incident.  it would be interesting to be regressed in case there are more details.  i definitely would take a lie detector test, because this did happen.
  in the alamosa colorado hills, late 1960s, my dad and older siblings had also seen dead, wild horses with green, glowing goo coming out of them, as well as strange lights in the sky, moving in ways that no air plane or jet could have. none of us reported any of this, for the same reasons others don't.
content.summary: Friend & i, around 9yrs old; summer 1970, tiny town of hasty, co, craft hovered directly over us, no sound, no air current, dark center, oscillating,colored lights outer circumference. hovered over us as we hurried, looking up at it 1.5 city bloc

content.detailedDescription: I was outside with husband observing the planets to the west and i happen to turn to the northeast and was looking at the stars when one of them pulsed a bright light and it began to move northward for a short distance and then disappeared. i told my husband what i saw and he was looking with me in the same direction when another star pulsed a bright light and it too moved to the north and then disappeared. years ago when i lived in new hampshire, i saw the same type of experience which made want report this.
content.summary: 2 hovering star lights pulse a bright light and proceeded to move northward

content.detailedDescription: At 10:05 pm. i was walking towards the space mountain ride at disneyland in anaheim ca. my son in law ask what is that and pointed at the sky. i looked up and a black ring was in the sky. i had look in that directions a few minutes before and nothing was there. we watched it for 4 mins with my son in law taking pictures. it looked like a large black smoke ring and slowly faded away. it was not effected by the wind or atmosphere. we were al a little scared. no one could figure out what it was. it slowly just faded away. i know a large crowd saw this and took pictures of it.
content.summary: Black ring in sky

content.detailedDescription:
Local residents have been observing low altitude crafts over our area for almost 2 years now. first observed in summer of 2013. nothing during winter months. activity picked up again in summer of 2014 and has continued nightly ever since.
  we first observed small silent crafts with blue and red light signatures. we could watch at least a dozen or more scoot about the sky every night. i set up a group of observers in our area to validate what we are seeing which includes ex-military personnel. the small craft can change from a blue/red signature into an orb right before our eyes. the crafts easily mimic stars to the untrained eye.
   the crafts move quickly and movements appear sporadic. we have seen crafts connect and disconnect and even fly toward a larger craft and be absorbed. larger crafts move slow and hover alot. they look like as large planet in the night sky. i mistook my first 2 large crafts as planets just 4 weeks ago. was learning to use my telescope and thought i would be able to find a planet easier than a star. boy was i wrong! once i lined the craft up in my crosshairs of the viewfinder, i could see the blue/red light signature and they kept moving on me! i was a bit frightened at first because the objects were larger and emitted an orange, wavering orb-like light around them. i/we do not understand what these crafts are, why they hover over our vicinity and why activity appears to be increasing. what are the larger crafts? a docking station? we have photographs and even video recording of what we are observing. just wanted to let you folks know about it.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Total of 5 large craft in area, perhaps more. 3 hover over town all night, 2 travel in w/nw direction then disappear over horizon.

content.detailedDescription:
As a kid my cousins and i were "camping"  in the backyard on a summer evening and were watching the stars waiting for another glimpse of echo i passing overhead -- we had been watching it over several previous nights.  

when the satellite came into view, we saw one object of equal brightness and apparent size on either side of it.  all three objects travelled above us in a consistent path, until disappearing from view as echo's orbit took it beyond the horizon.  this did not occur on any successive night we watched for echo 1.

i checked the local paper, the eugene register guard, the next day, and noticed a small article mentioning this occurrence.  i cut out the little article and carried it for years, but eventually after many moves, it was lost.

i am sorry that the dates, times, etc., are only approximate; i have wondered about this all my adult life and was curious if anyone else had seen anything like this before.  

thanks for providing a spot to share this event, even at such a late date, and more thanks for the good work you all do!

[item moved/cms/nd]
content.summary: Echo 1 satellitte accompanied by two bright objects -- one each side

content.detailedDescription: On june 10th, 2015 i decided to do a test flight of my drone which i'm selling. i took some video and photos of the drone in flight. this was in a large open space area approx. 1/2 mile from my house. while taking the video/photos i noticed nothing else in the sky at all. no planes, nothing. of course my eyes were on the sky the entire time. later when i loaded the photos into my computer i noticed an odd shaped "sky snake" hovering above my drone. i cannot tell how far away it is with the 2 dimensional photo. again, i did not see it when i took the photo. i didn't see anything in the sky after taking the photos either. it's impossible to give any more detail since i didn't find the object until after i downloaded the photos. i posted on fb, no one has any idea what this thing might be. how about you guys after seeing the photo attached? any educated guesses?

On june 11 2015 10pm slapout alabama i was walking my dog before bed and saw a star/orb that for some reason caught my attention. i kept staring at it and noticed it was hovering up and down but not drasticly or landing, maybe a thousand feet off the ground and a mile away. it was late and i was tired so i kept rubbing my eyes to make sure my contacts weren't just making a stars light look blurry. then its orb light would dissapear an green/orange lights around the edges would light up. i thought it looked like a saucer with the lights arranged around it. when it switched to the color lights a white light/beam appeared underneath shining straight down. it seemed to move around up and down and wasn't moving very far away. it kept the same patter for 10mins. orb light-green/orange lights- white light shining down. at one point the orb began to dim and go into clouds. i thought it was gone but within a few seconds all the clouds around it lit up into a bright light and it started moving toward me. i couldn't tell how fast or what its specific course was but seconds after seeing it light up the cloud, the craft was  500 yards away and maybe 300 feet off the ground moving toward me. i had called my mother right after it began. i told her i think its coming toward me an maybe 15sec later it had closed the distance and was continueing to move south in my direction. i couldn't see lights off of it anymore, i believe i was now seeing underneath it the craft. the looked triangle shaped, black with the point of the triangle squared off. it had closed that distance so fast and was so close to the ground i took off running back to my house and stayed inside. i've never seen one before, never seen big foot, or a ghost but this was extremely scary and undoubtedly an alien craft. seriously if that ever happens again i'm moving to the city.
content.summary: Orb of light next to north star, alternate from star light into green/orange lights around the craft. hovering, shined a beam/white light down several times.

content.detailedDescription:
At 8:43 p.M., on june 1st, while in our backyard located 3-miles from an airforce base and directly under the east to west commercial flightpath, i saw and imaged what initially looked like landing lights moving west at 8:43. 

something not understood took place, whereby the lights became much brighter and painted with two lines of variable thickness in apparent erratic movements like, but not camera shake. the image so painted in the viewfinder was quite bright.  i continued to click the nikon @200mm until it (they) disappeared.

so, i have before, during and after shots of the event on june 1, 2015.

please find with magnifying glass about 7 orbs associated with the bright form; and that they are round and of several colors, and not duplicated in pairs as the lines were.  after examining the image in camera and at a monitor resolution of 2564 x 1440 resolution, i realized something extraordinary had happened.  the orbs also left a trail, some brownish, and some green.

all images were taken at 8:43.  there was no air traffic on the flightpath, nor was there any coming from the airforce base during the shooting time.

my feelings? exited, like they had been on every sighting. that is, six from the backyard, beginning in november 2014 and at least one object at our amateur rocket launching site this year, after sending missiles to at least 2000ft.

mufon can expect more reports. i would be glad to provide larger files on request.
content.summary: Two lights moving west become associated with at least 7 brightly, colored orbs

content.detailedDescription: Bright orb above cloud line. flew north to south very very quickly.
content.summary: One light flew from north to south above clouds very very fast. then a much smaller light travelled from east to west above the clouds but not as bright

content.detailedDescription: We noticed several commercial aircraft making u-turns when eating dinner on our porch. i took some images of the contrails because that is something i don't see where i live. later that evening as i looked over the images, i noticed the 3 circular objects. i did not see them at the time the image was taken.
content.summary: Noticed commercial aircraft doing u-turns. noticed these 3 objects when reviewing the images. saw nothing when i took photo.

content.detailedDescription: Out of the corner of my eye i saw a shadow zip by not sure what it was some kind of craft.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Hovered changed direction circled change shape flew off at high speed.
